name: Tetrasaw
description:
In this puzzle game you need to fit the different shaped pieces into the right spot. All the pieces need to fit in together while making sure to match the colours behind.

There are over 60 normal levels, one MEGA LEVEL and a speed mode, which spawns levels until you can't handle any more.

See if you can complete the MEGA LEVEL for a little treat from the developers.

We want you to enjoy this game so are releasing it for free with no ADs. Please let us know if you enjoyed it by leaving a review.

PLEASE NOTE: This game was designed for mobile, and as such seems to have a few bugs when run in the browser(mainly with animation). This version is mainly for people to try the game out that do not have access to an Android phone.
